text: Jean-Michel Larrasket (22 May 1950 - 19 March 2018) was a French professor and engineer. He served as Vice-President for the northern Basque Country in the Basque Studies Society from 2012 until his death in 2018.Eusko Ikaskuntzak antolaketa berriarekin abiatuko du 2014 urtea Larrasket was known for his several projects for the social and economic development of the Northern Basque Country and he was also one of the founders of the Eticoop cooperative that promotes entrepreneurship in this geographical area.Jean Michel Larrasket Eusko Ikaskuntzako Iparraldeko lehendakaria zendu da ETICoop ou la nouvelle école du modèle coopératif - Le Journal du Pays Basque ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:French academics Category:French engineers Category:Writers from Paris
title: Jean Michel Larrasket
